duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate the transportation of inventory/goods by trucks, suppliers, and drivers.
Schedule drivers for pickups and deliveries on specific routes.
Maintain up-to-date records and review driver logs checking for violations and errors.
Oversee workflow, tracking real-time status of in-flight deliveries, scheduling, reporting and dashboards.
Act as a back-up driver and primary point of contact for Client on behalf of Milestone.
Conduct data quality audits on all service execution outputs and implement corrective actions to ensure the highest-level service quality and compliance.
Promote safe work activities regarding the transport service by conducting safety audits and attending company safety meetings.
Complete other duties as assigned with consideration for quality, safety, and efficiency.
Participate in all assigned training to support the execution of assigned responsibilities.
Ensure proactive customer service support to the Client and other operational teams as required.

education_certification.credential: Current valid driver's license and ability to pass a Motor Vehicle Record Check
